articles.title: Israeli military begins its ground offensive in Gaza City as thousands of Palestinians flee
articles.description: The Israeli military has commenced its ground offensive in Gaza City, with thousands of Palestinians reportedly fleeing the area. This development follows a period of intense bombardment and escalating tensions in the region.

articles.title: Prosecutors say alleged Charlie Kirk gunman wrote: 'I had enough of his hatred'
articles.description: Court documents reveal that the man accused of fatally shooting conservative activist Charlie Kirk allegedly admitted to the killing, stating that Kirk was propagating hate. The FBI director has also testified regarding evidence found near the scene.

articles.title: Trump's UK visit will mix trade and tech talks with royal pomp
articles.description: The US President's state visit to the UK is set to combine discussions on trade and technology with ceremonial events, including meetings with the royal family. The visit occurs against a backdrop of global divisions.
